name: tfrlem6
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1
body: -| wceq(c1, cab(s0, wrex(s1, con0, wa(wfn(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wral(s2, cv(s1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cfv(c0, cres(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))))))

body.origin:
|- wrel(cuni(c1))
-| wb(wrel(cuni(c1)), wral(hs0, c1, wrel(cv(hs0))))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wrel(cv(hs0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ Rel(⋃ c1)
⊣ (Rel(⋃ c1)↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, Rel(hs0)))
⊣ (hs0 ∈ c1 → Rel(hs0))

comment: Lemma for transfinite recursion. The union of all acceptable functions is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 8-Aug-1994.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-May-2015.)
